details:
noun
- a prominent status
= example: a prominent status
= synonyms: importance
- splendid or imposing in size or appearance
= example: splendid or imposing in size or appearance
= synonyms: magnificence
- the quality of being magnificent or splendid or grand
= example: the quality of being magnificent or splendid or grand
= synonyms: magnificence
- unusual largeness in size or extent or number
= example: unusual largeness in size or extent or number
= synonyms: enormousness, greatness, immenseness, immensity, sizeableness, vastness, wideness
